name: Semi-supervised Cluster-then-label
description: Pre-training methods are aimed to guide the parameters of a network towards interesting regions in model space using unlabeled data, before fine-tuning the parameters with the labeled data.
x_kb_article:
## References
Jashish Shrestha. (n.d.). Beginner's Guide to Semi-Supervised Learning. [Link](http://jashish.com.np/blog/posts/beginners-guide-to-semi-supervised-learning/)
